Text:
Hey there, pretty lady! Come have a gander! I just
got some real lively pets in!
Who—me?

But of course! You're the prettiest young lady to
ever walk this planet, ain'tcha?
Heh. Someone's got a good eye.
Sis, he's just trying to butter you up.
Shut up.
Ngh.

Anyway, come and have a look. This gem just came in
this morning!

Today's special. If you need a dark knight pet,
Goldy here is your man!
The shopkeeper drags over a young blond man.

What do you think? A hottie like him would go great
with a young lady like yourself!

He seems to be in bad shape. You should take better
care of your merchandise.
I feel like I've seen this guy before...

Haha! Maybe he got scuffed up a bit in transport, eh?
All right then, how about I drop him from 30 million
zeni to 27 million?
That's pretty expensive.

Fine, fine! Just for today, how about I throw in
another fine stallion?
You call them stallions?

Feast your eyes on this fresh catch! This here's
Quinton!

The man the shopkeeper drags out has the face of a
pro wrestler heel.

How about it! Forty million zeni for the set! You
won't see deals like this anywhere else!
What about that cut on his stomach?
Oh no, he got knocked around during transport too?!

Hahahaha! Then hey, 37 million zeni! I can't go any
lower than that!
Not interested.
Well, you drive a hard bargain!
Fine! Let's shake on 35 mil!
Sorry, but I've got the only one I need here.
Ah, so the kid's your...
Please don't get the wrong idea.
Come on, we're going.
So you like 'em young...

In that case, a couple of debt-laden students from
Midgar Academy were among the expected arrivals...
Pretty sure their names were Bo and Skull or
something—
I can't walk with you dragging me, you know.

If I don't haul you along, I'm sure you'll find some
way to get yourself lost.
What? No, I won't.
Yes, you will.
Will not.
Of course you will.
You've got a point.

(We arrive at the Dark Knight Association's base, and
my sister immediately gets called into a meeting.
Apparently, they're getting all the notable dark
knights together to have some sort of discussion.)

(Claire tries desperately to get me in, but her
efforts are in vain. "Wait here like a good boy,"
she commands me, then joins the assembly.)

(I was bored at the inn, so I decided to go for a
stroll, but...)
Whoops, sorry.
(I take my wallet back, and theirs along with it.)
Call it righteous retribution.

(Like Claire said, I'm going to have to think about
what I want to do in the future. At the end of the
day, it all comes down to money.)

(As long as I can make some cash, everything will all
work out. And did I mention the Lawless City is full
of glorified bandits?)
Excuse me.

(I'd bet anything that their boss is making mad bank
off all the shady stuff they're doing. In other words,
all I have to do is bust in and make off with their
treasure, and my problems will go away.)
(Easy.)
My bad, big fella.

(If I focus on amassing enough money to spend the
rest of my life goofing off, I'll never have to worry
about finding a real job.)

(Heck, I can even try out a bunch of different
unassuming jobs...like a gatekeeper, a guard,
a bum, a baker... The possibilities are endless.)
Just go home, kid.

(By having access to money, one can live one's life
unshackled to it.)
(Ooh, that sounds kinda smart.)
Thank ya kindly.

(As far as I'm concerned, any city where you can
make money just by going on a stroll is basically
paradise.)

(Maybe my true calling is to become Background
Resident A in the Lawless City.)
Bastard! You'll pay!
You've got some nerve!
Now you've gone and pissed me off!

I lost my bet and got dumped by Marie! And you're to
blame for everything!
Groar.
(So, those are ghouls, henchmen of the vampires.)

(I hear they have a ton of HP, so they make for
satisfying punching bags.)

(Might makes right. That's the Lawless City for you,
drenched in blood and slaughter—)
(A wave of magic...)
Aaghh!
Wh-What the...?!
This thing is still alive?!
Aaag...ghh...
Graaarrr!!!
Ah...ghh...!
Aaaaaghhh!
(Humans bit by ghouls become ghouls.)

(...At least, that's what the rumors suggest. But in
reality...)
Aa...grarrr.
(...Could be that thing's fault.)
(The red moon is activating all the magic in the city.)

Left alone, their numbers will continue to increase.
What to do... Should I flee like all the other
background characters?

Or can I assume I'll never run into any of these
people again and take on the role of a mysterious
young man?

Anyway, since I've been handed this zombie apocalypse
storyline on a silver platter, I might as well make
the most of it and stir up some...
Take cover.

Suddenly, a warrior swoops in from behind and bisects
the ghoul.

She's an attractive redhead dressed all in black and
wearing a wide-brimmed hat.
If you want to live, then flee.
If you want to live...then flee.
The rampage is starting.
The rampage...is starting.
The moon is red... There's no time.
No...time.
Who are you?

I'm Mary, the Ancient Vampire Hunter... And I'm here
to hunt vampires...
(What...is this?)
(This feeling... It's like my chest is throbbing...)
(Hold on...)
(Is this...?!)
Hehehe...

(Looks like it's gonna be a little longer before I
make it back... I hope Claire doesn't get too mad.)
